descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5][b][color=#e69138] INTRODUCTION[/color]
[/b][/size][/font][size=4] This is an attempt to improve the Nordic Murals to 4K resolution.[/size]
[size=4] The excellent 2K textures from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3147/?]Re-Defined Dungeons[/url] by Gizmo were used as a base here, upscaled to 4K and  overlayed with another 4K texture. The normal maps were left untouched. 

[/size][size=4] The results are as you see here :
[/size]
  [img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81755-0-1485346110.jpg[/img]

                                                                                      [size=3][b] Vanilla vs Nordic Murals UHD[/b][/size]



[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#e69138][size=5][b] PERFORMANCE
[/b][/size][/color][/font][size=4] The performance impact shouldn't be huge even if the diffuse textures are 4K since these are only found in  interior cells. Moreover the normal maps are 2K.
 A 2K version is also available.


[/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#e69138][size=5][b] INSTALLATION
[/b][/size][/color][/font][size=4] Extract to your Skyrim Data folder.


[/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#e69138][size=5][b] CREDITS
[/b][/size][/color][/font] [size=4] Gizmo for Re-Defined Dungeons WIP[/size]
author: Navajoth K K
